Syed Awais Ali

syedawaisali@live.com
Phone: (+92) 321 9012551

Senior DevOps/Site Reliability Engineer and Trainer with around 7+ years of experience. Currently working as SRE @ edX. Being an active member of the open-soruce contributors community I have contributed to many of the open-source projects. I have written and developed APIs for our application to be used for Integration to other services. I have experience of managing the teams as well when I used to work as a Project Manager for a startup focused on NFV/SDN technologies. I lead a team to deliver core enhancements to Juniper’s Open Contrail (Tugsten).

I am currently maintaining the infrastructure automation using Terraform and helping in transition the legacy applications to the Kubernetes. Working on ArgoCD and Kustomize for CI/CD pipelines automation. My current responsibilities include global on-call rotation and working on delivering a light weight CI/CD pipeline using buildah, Podman and crun. Monitoring our infrastructure with different tools and alerting based on any incident. Automation of repetitive tasks in Python and often in shell scripting. Designing process for on-boarding and off-boardings of the employees. Maintain integrity of the overall system

Driven by passion for open-source and always learning from the community and contributing back to it. I am placed amongst the top 30 Openstack contributors in Openstack forums. Currently writing some Github Actions that community can use, will post the link soon.

    • Migration of Application to Kubernetes

    Working on migrating our existing legacy apps to Kubernetes AWS EKS while wnsuring HA and reliability. Moniotring the uptime of the applications deployed using promethues, grafana and NewRelic. Making sure that the required SLA's,SLI's and SLO's are being met. Using AWS ECR as a registry service for our applications

    Architect of Lightweight CI/CD cycle

    Developed a Lightweight CI/CD pipeline using daemonless technological stack that included Buildah to build images instead of Docker. Harbor was used as Image registry for maintaing images. Github actions were used to trigger pieline flow and perorm all the steps for CI and then make an automated PR to the configruation repository which is then merged and ArgoCD watching the changes syncs and deploys new application to the Kubernetes cluster

    Upgrading the DB without downtime in PROD

    The PROD DB needed to be upgraded without any downtime. I did that using pt-online-schema tool without any downtime

    NFV Orchestrator

    Architected an VNF lifecylce amanger and NFV orchestrator, which inluded injection of configs into a VNF at run time and configruation of VNF from a centralized GUI.

    Migration from Junier's Contrail v2 to v3

    I Managed a project of migrating the existing Heat templates for contrail from an older to a newre version. Wrote automation that could transform scripts and make dymaic yamls.
